meanings.definition: The quality or state of being profane.
meanings.sent1: Her profaneness was evident in the way she spoke about the church.
meanings.sent2: The profaneness of his language shocked the entire congregation.
meanings.sent3: Despite her profaneness, she was still welcomed into the community.
meanings.sent4: The profaneness of his actions tarnished his reputation irreparably.
meanings.sent5: The profaneness of the graffiti on the church walls was a disgrace.

meanings.definition: The act of speaking irreverently or disrespectfully about sacred things.
meanings.sent1: His profaneness during the ceremony offended many attendees.
meanings.sent2: The profaneness of his jokes about the Bible upset the religious group.
meanings.sent3: Despite his profaneness, he managed to maintain a sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her profaneness towards the holy relics was met with disapproval.
meanings.sent5: The profaneness of his remarks echoed through the silent church.
